update warning_info
NOTICE_NAME=#{noticeName},
NOTICE_CONTENT=#{noticeContent},
NOTICE_TYPE=#{noticeType},
NOTICE_LEVEL=#{noticeLevel},
NOTICE_DATE=#{noticeDate},
NOTICE_ADDR=#{noticeAddr},
NOTICE_LONGI=#{noticeLongi},
NOTICE_LATI=#{noticeLati},
NOTICE_OBJECT_NAME=#{noticeObjectName},
NOTICE_OBJECT_TYPE=#{noticeObjectType},
NOTICE_OBJECT_ID=#{noticeObjectId},
WARNING_TAGS=#{warningTags},
where NOTICE_ID=#{noticeId};
mapper.select: select e.* from event_info e where e.event_id in (select h.HANDLE_EVENT_ID from xhww_handle_log h where h.HANDLE_DATE >= #{fromDate} and h.HANDLE_DATE <= now() and h.IS_DELETE != '1' group by h.HANDLE_EVENT_ID having count(h.HANDLE_EVENT_ID) >= 5) and e.is_delete != '1' and e.is_settlement != '1';

select p.* from person_info p where p.person_id in (select r.OBJECT_ID from event_relation_object r where r.RELATION_TIME >= #{fromDate} and r.RELATION_TIME <= now() and r.IS_DELETE != '1' and r.OBJECT_TYPE = 'person' group by r.OBJECT_ID having count(r.OBJECT_ID) >= 5) and p.is_delete != '1';

select u.* from unit_info u where u.unit_id in (select r.OBJECT_ID from event_relation_object r where r.RELATION_TIME >= #{fromDate} and r.RELATION_TIME <= now() and r.IS_DELETE != '1' and r.OBJECT_TYPE = 'unit' group by r.OBJECT_ID having count(r.OBJECT_ID) >= 5) and u.is_delete != '1';
